channel.title: 1.0.9 Player models when executing are weird
channel.description: #### What happened? When executing the player models look like they have two stones for feet and no balance with their hands. #### What was SUPPOSED to happen? When executing the player models should look much better, like in previous versions for comparison. #### Steps to reproduce: Get in a game, execute someone, compare the execution animation to the old ones #### Comments:

item.title: 1.0.9 Player models when executing are weird
item.dc:creator: Sicky
item.description:
What happened?

When executing the player models look like they have two stones for feet and no balance with their hands.

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

When executing the player models should look much better, like in previous versions for comparison.

Steps to reproduce:

Get in a game, execute someone, compare the execution animation to the old ones

Comments:

Read full topic
item.source: 1.0.9 Player models when executing are weird
